htmlBody: The current title of this post doesn't suggest anything about AI, which you highlight here. I'd recommend changing it. If he's funding US government AI development, I'd just say that. If it's also policy, maybe say "AI development and policy". Could also pose it as a question: "Is Eric Schmidt funding AI capabilities research by the US government?"
Simce you asked for more resources: Scott Alexander: "Why NOT slow AI progress" https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/why-not-slow-ai-progress
